modules.name: Catchphrases
modules.description: A gimmick module that responds to pings with one of your defined catchphrases.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: Autoroles
modules.description: A module that automatically assigns roles to any new members.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: Economy
modules.description: A module that adds a server currency. Primarily a framework for other modules.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: Casino
modules.description: A module that adds some casino games.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: Levelling
modules.description: A module that adds XP and levelling to your server, with optional role and currency rewards.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: React Roles
modules.description: A module that lets members self-assign roles by reacting to messages.
modules.author: enhancedrock

modules.name: Welcomer
modules.description: A module that welcomes and farewells members when they join/leave in DMs or a channel.
modules.author: enhancedrock
